result.execSummary:
The defendant Chad Raymond Brush was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Child Pornography [Modifiers: Penalty - Possession of Child Pornography], a class D felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.12(1m).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Pay child pornography surcharge of $1,500.00 - 3 images @ $500.00 per image.

Defendant shall not access the internet without agent approval.

Undergo a sex offender assessment and comply with recommendations.

Comply with any conditions, no contacts or assessments per agent and follow through with treatment recommended.

Pay supervision fees as determined by the Department of Corrections.

timeConds.notes:
Without Huber.
To report to jail by 6:00 p.m. on the 1st day of March, April, May, June, July, August, September & October, 2016.
To be released on the 25th of each month except for the month of October defendant to be released on the 5th.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Chad Raymond Brush
